title: Side Character Survival Guidelines - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Xianxia
tags: Ancient Times   Cultivation   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Multiple Personalities   Parody   Quirky Characters   Short Story   Younger Love Interests
author: 神田洛
description:
In the world of a novel, each character has laws guiding how each character lives. They know that they’re characters in a novel, and their personalities are not always in line with their character setting.

This is a story of the male deuteragonist in such a world.>
